name: Crude Helmet
desc: When you are attacked, treat any ^modifier_2x_circle^ attack modifier card the enemy draws as a ^modifier_plus_1^ instead.

name: Simple Charm
desc: Remove one ^modifier_minus_one_circle^ from your attack modifier deck.

name: Spyglass
desc: During your attack ability, gain advantage on one attack.

name: Crude Hide Armor
desc: On the next two attacks targeting you, the attacker gains disadvantage.

name: Crude Chain Armor
desc: When you suffer ^damage^ from an attack, gain ^fh-shield^ 2 for the attack.

name: Traveling Cloak
desc: Increase your maximum hit point value by 1.

name: Crude Spear
desc: During your single-target melee attack ability, target an enemy two hexes away.

name: Crude Bow
desc: During your ranged attack, add +1 ^range^ to the entire attack action.

name: Protective Charm
desc: During your turn, grant one ally within ^range^ 3: ^fh-shield^ 1 ^eot^

name: Crude Shield
desc: When an enemy would apply a negative condition to you, prevent the condition.

name: Heavy Sword
desc: During your melee attack ability +1 ^attack^ and $muddle$ to one attack.

name: Reinforced Shield
desc: When an enemy would apply a negative condition to you, prevent the condition.

name: Crude Boots
desc: During your move ability, add +1 ^fh-move^ to the ability.

name: Soothing Scepter
desc: During your turn, peform $regenerate$ ~!^target^ 1 ally, ^fh-range^ 2!~.

name: Volatile Boots
desc: Up to once each turn, during your move ability add +1 ^fh-move^, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.
backDesc: Add -1 ^fh-move^ to your first move ability on your turn. Flip this card over at the end of your turn.

name: Corrupted Blade
desc: During your melee attack ability, add $fh-wound$, $poison$, and $muddle$ to one attack.

name: Stamina Potion
desc: During your turn, ^recover^ one level 1 card from your discard pile.

name: Amulet of Life
desc: During your turn peform: ^fh-heal^ 1 ~!self!~

name: Warden's Robes
desc: When one of your summons suffers ^damage^ from an attack, that summon gains ^fh-shield^ 2 for the attack.

name: Leather Armor
desc: When you are attacked the attacker gains disadvantage.

name: Winged Shoes
desc: During your turn, add ^fh-jump^ to all your move abilities.

name: Boots of Speed
desc: At the beginning of a round after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your leadning initiaive value by 10.

name: Poison Dagger
desc: During your melee attack add $poison$ to a single attack.

name: Heater Shield
desc: When you suffer ^damage^ from an attack, gain ^shield^ 1 for the attack.
